baseMessages.content:
You are a classifier that identifies which of the following real estate attributes are mentioned in the text: 
                        ["totalArea", "complexYear", "numberOfBalconies", "gardenPrice", "hasAttic", "flatYear", "gardenArea", "loggieArea", "isInsulated", "price", "hasBalcony", "garagePrice", "hasParking", "floor", "garageArea", "rooms", "numberOfTerraces", "hasSeparateToilet", "numberOfCellars", "balconyArea", "flatArea", "hasTerrace", "totalFloors", "cellarArea", "hasGarden", "flatModificationYear", "complexModificationYear", "terraceArea", "hasGarage", "parkingPrice", "hasCellar", "hasLoggie", "storey", "numberOfLoggias", "hasElevator", "totalStoreys"].

                        Return only the attribute names that are explicitly or implicitly mentioned.
                        Do not guess. Only return attributes that are clearly present.

examples.content: Input: B10 offers for sale a generously sized 4-room apartment with high ceilings on the 2nd storey in a prestigious location with a beautiful panoramic view in the village of Hôrky. The apartment is for sale with a standard that includes a terrace with large-format gres tiles, a pergola with terrace shading, bathroom fittings - large-format tiles and flooring, a cast acrylic bathtub, a cast marble shower tray, a shower enclosure made of tempered safety glass with aquaperle surface treatment, a toilet bowl with a removable duroplast seat with a slow-close system, a slim ceramic sink with a cabinet and an integrated organizer, double painting of walls and ceilings (white color), security entrance door to the apartment, fire-resistant, optical internet - Telekom (data sockets in every room), video doorbell, large-format aluminum windows and HS portal with insulating triple glazing - (completely concealed fittings, handles in the color of the windows), exterior blinds, a fully functional smart home NIKO home control - control of the entrance door via the video doorbell, control of lighting, control of exterior blinds, control of underfloor heating in each living room separately, all managed through a smartphone app remotely or via a central digital unit in the apartment or manually in each room using designer switches and a digital thermostat. Cellar storage room. Outdoor parking space. Common interior spaces : shared stroller storage, communal hobby rooms on each mezzanine floor. Interior floors - mineral composite. Interior doors - flush, concealed hardware, designer handle. AGENT'S TIP : The perfect combination of city and village, living and nature, relaxation and active life. Morning coffee on the terrace or a barbecue with neighbors under the stars? If you have found your requirements for a new home in this, then our stylish project is tailor-made for you! If you are tired of the hustle and bustle of the city, views limited to the nearest building, or daily parking issues, we offer a tailored solution just for you. The location offers a sense of nature all around, yet thanks to its less than 10-minute drive from the city center, you can still enjoy the standards and services that Žilina has to offer. Price: 359900 € .
{ "attributes": ["rooms", "hasCellar", "floor", "price", "hasParking", "hasTerrace", "storey"] }

Input: TOCA - EXCLUSIVE - RESERVED - we offer for sale a 3-room apartment with a floor area of 83.9 m2 in a low-energy new building located on the outskirts of the city - close to nature. Input: EXCLUSIVELY, we offer for sale a spacious 4-room apartment with a usable area of 80 m2. Its address is in the popular neighborhood of Hliny 7, just a 10-minute walk from the historic center of Žilina. The property includes a large, reconstructed loggia with an area of up to 10.5 m2 and a brick cellar with an area of 1.3 m2 on the first storey of the building. The apartment is located on the 8th of 8 floors of the insulated apartment building with an elevator. The surroundings of the apartment building feature well-maintained grassy areas with lush greenery, where benches, playgrounds, and climbing structures for children are situated in its pleasant shade. There are several parking options nearby. LAYOUT The apartment is pleasantly bright, with windows facing north, east, and south. Its orientation offers beautiful views of the surroundings and ensures a supply of natural light throughout the day. It consists of the following rooms, none of which are through : - living room / 18.3 m2 / with entrance from the hallway and exit to the loggia; - bedroom / 15.4 m2 / accessible from the hallway; - children's room 1 / 11.4 m2 / or office with entrance from the hallway; - children's room 2 / 9.2 m2 / or guest room or study accessible from the kitchen; - kitchen / 12.3 m2 / L-shaped, equipped with a kitchen unit with built-in appliances, refrigerator with freezer, and space for dining seating; - pantry / 1.1 m2 / with access from the kitchen; - bathroom / 3.2 m2 / with sink, bathtub, and washing machine; - toilet / 1.0 m2 / as a separate room with a toilet bowl and sink; - entrance hallway / 8.7 m2 / with access to the toilet, three living rooms, and the kitchen. The spacious loggia / 10.5 m2 / is accessed from the living room. EQUIPMENT AND FURNISHINGS The apartment's furnishings are practical, emphasizing natural decor and the inherent beauty of wood. The property has undergone several reconstructions, the latest of which included the reconstruction of the apartment core and sanitary facilities, replacement of riser pipes, installation of new plastic windows with interior blinds, modernization, and glazing of the loggia. The floor of the apartment features well-preserved wooden parquet and tiles. Above the windows, there are curtain rods with curtains and drapes. The bedroom, children's rooms, and entrance hallway are furnished with wardrobes offering ample storage space. The privacy of the apartment residents is protected by security and fire-resistant entrance doors. The kitchen includes appliances: Mora gas cooker with hood and oven, Whirlpool dishwasher. Next to the counter, there is a refrigerator with a freezer from the manufacturer Whirlpool, the automatic washing machine from Indesit is located in the bathroom, and the living room is equipped with a Sencor television. Appliances, furnishings, and furniture, unless otherwise agreed with the buyer, will remain in the apartment and are included in the sale price. LOCATION The offered property is located in a sought-after area, providing a diverse range of amenities and many other benefits. In close proximity, there are grocery stores and other retail shops, various service establishments, elementary, kindergarten, and secondary schools, a sports center, public garages, and more. The vibrant city center of Žilina is just a 10-minute walk away, as is the beautiful Bôrik city park, offering a rich variety of options for sports and leisure activities. public transport stops with regular connections are located approximately 200 meters from the apartment building. Road access to the expressway for the directions Bratislava - Žilina and Žilina - Čadca is available within 2 minutes. The offered apartment is suitable for a buyer who wants to personally enjoy the advantages of living in the center of the regional city or ensure a financial return on investment through renting out the property. Availability: May 2024. Monthly costs: building management 209 € + electricity and gas 30 € . Price: 186400 € Exceptional opportunity for you: along with the apartment, the seller offers a lockable garage in a nearby parking structure for the price of 10000 € .

Input: RADO Reality exclusively offers for sale a 2-room apartment in a brick building in an excellent location at Sad na Studničkách in Žilina! The spacious apartment has a total area of 65 m2, and a large cellar is included with the apartment. If you are looking for a spacious old-town apartment that you can move into immediately, located on a great address right in the center of Žilina, this offer is perfect for you! In 2018, the apartment underwent a complete extensive reconstruction - water, waste, and electrical systems were replaced, plastic windows with triple glazing were installed, a new bathroom with sanitary ware was created, and the floors, walls, and entire furnishings were updated. The beautiful apartment is excellently designed in terms of layout - upon entering through the high-quality security door, you have ample space in the hallway for shoes and coats. On the left side, there is a bathroom with a bathtub and toilet, along with a great bonus of this apartment - a pantry, which is also equipped with water and drainage for the placement of a washing machine. Around the tastefully placed bookshelf, you will reach the kitchen featuring a new kitchen unit with built-in appliances (dishwasher, oven, glass-ceramic hob, extractor hood) . The right part of the apartment features a spacious living room (20 m2), which can also accommodate a dining table. From the living room, you can access the bedroom (14 m2) with a double bed and a wardrobe. The apartment also includes a spacious cellar (7 m2) . The apartment is located on the ground floor of the brick residential building without an elevator. The building was built in such a way that it offers residents greenery and a relaxation area in its courtyard. A complete revitalization is planned in the near future. The entrance doors with an electronic intercom and the windows in the common areas have been replaced. The location where you can live is truly excellent - right behind the apartment building, you will find a beautiful park with a playground and a cozy café, or you can simply relax by the fountain in the shade of the trees. Moreover, you are only a 5-minute walk away from A. Hlinka Square, Marian Square, and the shopping centers Mirage and Aupark. The shopping center and Lidl grocery store can be found directly across from the apartment building. Since the apartment is located in the city center, a full range of amenities in the vicinity is a given. The apartment is sold fully furnished and is immediately available. If you are looking for a stylishly furnished apartment in an excellent location, this offer is just for you!

Input: We offer for sale a 3-room apartment in Žilina, M. R. Štefánika. Area: usable 68 m2. Condition of the property: complete reconstruction. Price 186900 € . We offer for sale a sunny and modernly reconstructed 3-room apartment with a total area of 68 m2 + a cellar of 4 m2, located in the old part of the city of Žilina on M. R. Štefánik Street, just a two-minute walk from Hlinkovo Square and the historic center of the city. The apartment is located in an insulated and reconstructed brick residential building on the 4th floor of 4, without an elevator and without a balcony. The apartment has undergone a complete structural and layout change, which will be completed in June 06 / 2024, where the owner has focused on high-standard and modern reconstruction using high-quality materials and appliances! The apartment is pleasantly bright with a northeast - southwest orientation. The apartment features a bespoke kitchen with built-in appliances - electric oven, induction hob, extractor hood, combined refrigerator with freezer, and dishwasher. The apartment has a separate bathroom with a bathtub, a sink with a cabinet, provisions for connecting a washing machine, and a separate toilet (Geberit) .
